name: Ball Game (itch) (jenispatel1889)
description:
A ball traversed the screen, skipping off the best and side squares. At the point when a square is hit, the ball skips away and the square is crushed. The player loses a turn when the ball contacts the base of the screen. To keep this from happening, the player has a portable oar to ricochet the ball upward, keeping it in play. 

There are a few things which exploit to the game:add additional ball, influence the ball to infiltrate the square, make paddle bigger, and make paddle littler.
